snippet.title: The Black Sanctum gameplay (PC Game, 1984)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for The Black Sanctum, Dos PC game produced by Mark Data Products in 1984 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/the-black-sanctum/6164/
Your task in the The Black Sanctum, is to rid the ancient monastery of evil that has taken over. See all the evil locations in this spooky adventure in full hi-res detail. .
Played through Dosbox emulation platform.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Voodoo Island - https://youtu.be/9BmeRQeSZmw
Wizard of Oz - https://youtu.be/UIYhEitqDD8
Perry Mason - https://youtu.be/vHIWt6shhWc
